Module LokiViewer
Package LokiViewer.Object

Class Object3D

java.lang.Object
LokiViewer.Object.Object3D
public class Object3D extends Object
The object class to draw
Author:
Renhao Lu

  • Constructor Details

    • Object3D

      public Object3D(HashMap<Integer,Vertex> vertices, ArrayList<Face> faces)
      Constructor. Many faces may share same edges, hence use a HashSet to prevent repeating.
      Parameters:
      vertices - vertices
      faces - faces

  • Method Details

    • getOriginBorder

      private double[] getOriginBorder()
      Get the original border of the object, in order to rescale it to fill half of the window
      Returns:
      border coordinate in x-y plain in the order of: x+, y+, x- y-

    • getZoomAndShift

      private double[] getZoomAndShift(Dimension d)
      Given the target window dimension, return the zoom factor and shift parameters to make object fill half the window and in the center
      Parameters:
      d - window dimension
      Returns:
      zoom and shift parameters, in the order of: zoom factor, x-shift, y-shift

    • topologicalSortFacesRenderOrder

      private ArrayList<Integer> topologicalSortFacesRenderOrder()
      Get the rendering order of the faces in their z-order. Because not all face are comparable, I implemented a topological sorting there.
      Returns:
      a ArrayList of the rendering order

    • naiveSortFacesRenderOrder

      private ArrayList<Integer> naiveSortFacesRenderOrder()
      Sort faces according to their average z value
      Returns:
      a ArrayList of the rendering order

    • draw

      public void draw(Graphics g, Dimension d, boolean reScale)
      Draw the object in window. If need to rescale, first rescale all vertices. Then draw all faces, vertices, and edges
      Parameters:
      g - the Graphics context in which to paint
      d - window dimension
      reScale - Whether rescale is needed (when load the file or resize the window)

    • setDrawVertexAndEdge

      public void setDrawVertexAndEdge(boolean flag)
      Set drawVertexAndEdge
      Parameters:
      flag - target value

    • setDrawFace

      public void setDrawFace(boolean flag)
      Set drawFaces
      Parameters:
      flag - target value

    • setPainterAlgo

      public void setPainterAlgo(boolean flag)

    • generateRotateOrigin

      public void generateRotateOrigin()
      Find the nearest point to the observer, set the rotation origin's x, y coordinates the same as that point. Find the farthest point to the observer, and set the z coordinate of rotation origin the average of nearest and farthest.

    • removeRotateOrigin

      public void removeRotateOrigin()
      remove rotation origin after mouse released

    • rotate

      public void rotate(double x, double y)
      Rotate all vertex
      Parameters:
      x - angle in x component
      y - angle in y component

    • updateVertex

      public void updateVertex()
      After rotation, update the vertex

    • parse

      public static Object3D parse(File file) throws ObjectParseException
      Parse the input file
      Parameters:
      file - input file
      Returns:
      new object3D
      Throws:
      ObjectParseException - when any file reading or parsing problem happens
